description: Main application widget file for a Flutter app named 'Memory Keeper'. It sets up providers, theming, navigation, and persistent tab state.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: State management class for notes, extends ChangeNotifier. Placeholder for future implementation.

classes.name: WalletProvider
classes.description: State management class for wallet entries, extends ChangeNotifier. Placeholder for future implementation.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, sets up providers, theme, and app navigation.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Main scaffold hosting bottom navigation tabs, state preservation of selected tab, and placeholder floating action buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and AppRoot, sets up providers and navigation.

methods.name: _loadSelectedTab
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the last selected tab index from SharedPreferences.

methods.name: _persistSelectedTab
methods.description: Saves the current selected tab index to SharedPreferences.

methods.name: _onItemTapped
methods.description: Handles taps on bottom navigation items, updates state and saves preferences.

methods.name: _buildFabForTab
methods.description: Returns appropriate FloatingActionButton for the current tab.
